stories.text: I noticed sec.gov is blocking all requests from AWS since the 4 days ago. Has this been the same for you? How are you able to bypass this issue? Currently I can scrape sec.gov only from local computer. My ideal solution is that I can have a program that runs on some remote servers
stories.title: Sec.gov is blocking all requests from AWS?
What is blockchain? The shortest explanation

stories.text: Are there any blog/Youtube Channels on Cancer? My family is fighting this deadly disease & except a few bits of info here & there I'm struggling to gather a comprehensive set of information about this disease. Communication with doctors is another challenge where a bunch of medical terminology frequently comes up in the conversation which I've no clue about. I guess, oncologists in my part of world aren't that open to sharing information. My knowledge about Cancer is close to zero and I'm sure some of you must have navigated the world of medicines & thought of reaching out to this community.
stories.title: Ask HN: Blogs/YouTube Channels on Cancer?
